Author: AtmoOmen
Name: Currency Tracker
Changelog:
- Functional Adjustments:
  - Added a new function Location Filter under Filter Options, and it enables users to enter key words to serach transactions with relevant Location names.
  - Added some new functions under Transactions Toolbar: Select All, Inverse Select, Unselect.
  - Added a new interface operation logic to Transactions List, which now enables users to select a number of transactions when holding Ctrl.
  - Adjusted Time Filter function code logic.
- UI Adjustments:
  - Added a sequence number column to Transactions List.
  - Adjusted the layout of various functions when expanding/collapsing under the Filter Options.
  - Adjusted the appearance of the functions under Filter Options except for the Inverse Sort function when enabled.
- Others:
  - Adjusted Transactions List draw logic.
  - Adjusted some appropiate expressions in English localization.
